Substitute.embed: {"title":"Substitute","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Class","value":"Status"},{"name":"Range","value":"Self, Illusion, Coat"},{"name":"Effect","value":"The user loses 1\/4 of their maximum Hit Points. If the user would be hit by a Move or attack, instead the Substitute gets hit. Apply weakness, resistance and stats to the Substitute. The Substitute is immune to Status Afflictions and Status Moves. Moves with the Social or Sonic keywords completely ignore and bypass the Substitute. Once the Substitute has been destroyed, the user may be hit as normal. Substitute cannot be used if the user has less than 1\/4 of their full Hit Points."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Smart"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Catching Up"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.410"}}

While Lifted, the user may not apply any Evasion bonuses to determine whether they are hit by Moves or not. The Lifted target may use a Shift Action to roll 1d20; on a result of 16+, they stop being Lifted. *Grants Telekinetic"},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Smart"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Steady Performance"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.425"}}

Lock-On's effect, on both the User and Target, can be passed by Baton Pass."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Smart"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Good Show!"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.400"}}

If that Trainer sends out a replacement, they do not lose their Command action."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Cool"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Excitement"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.406"}}

Accelerock.embed: {"title":"Accelerock","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":" Rock"},{"name":"Frequency","value":" At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":" 2"},{"name":"DB","value":"4"},{"name":"Class","value":" Physical"},{"name":"Range","value":" Melee, 1 Target, Priority"},{"name":"Contest Type","value":" Tough"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":" Saving Grace"}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.22"}}

Anchor Shot.embed: {"title":"Anchor Shot","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":" Steel"},{"name":"Frequency","value":" EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":" 2"},{"name":"DB","value":"8"},{"name":"Class","value":" Physical"},{"name":"Range","value":" Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Effect","value":" The Target is Trapped for 2 rounds. Anchor Shot may only be used from the user's Anchor Token."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":" Tough"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":" Catching Up"}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.23"}}

Gear Up.embed: {"title":"Gear Up","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":" Steel"},{"name":"Frequency","value":" Scene x2"},{"name":"Class","value":" Status"},{"name":"Range","value":" Burst 4"},{"name":"Effect","value":" All targets with the Plus or Minus Abilities receive +1 Attack and Special Attack Combat Stages."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":" Smart"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":" Get Ready"}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.23"}}

Smart Strike.embed: {"title":"Smart Strike","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":" Steel"},{"name":"Frequency","value":" EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":" None"},{"name":"DB","value":"7"},{"name":"Class","value":" Physical"},{"name":"Range","value":" Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Effect","value":" Smart Strike cannot miss."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":" Smart"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":" Safe Option"}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.23"}}

Liquidation.embed: {"title":"Liquidation","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":" Water"},{"name":"Frequency","value":" EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":" 2"},{"name":"DB","value":"9"},{"name":"Class","value":" Physical"},{"name":"Range","value":" Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Effect","value":" The target\u2019s Defense is lowered by 1 Combat Stage on a 17+."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":" Beauty"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":" Steady Performance"}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.24"}}

Toxic Thread.embed: {"title":"Toxic Thread","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":" Poison"},{"name":"Frequency","value":" Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":" 2"},{"name":"Class","value":" Status"},{"name":"Range","value":" 6, 1 Target"},{"name":"Effect","value":" The target is Poisoned and has their Speed lowered by 1 Combat Stage. If the target is already Poisoned, they instead lose a Tick of Hit Points and has their Speed lowered by 2 Combat Stages."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":" Smart"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":" Excitement"}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.20"}}

Furious Strikes.embed: {"title":"Furious Strikes","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"--"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":"2"},{"name":"DB","value":"3"},{"name":"Class","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Range","value":"WR, 1 Target, Five Strike"},{"name":"Effect","value":"For each hit rolled on your Five Strike roll, the target of the attack has their Evasion reduced by 1 for one full round."},{"name":"Limitation","value":"Melee or Short Ranged Weapons Only"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.290"}}

Titanic Slam.embed: {"title":"Titanic Slam","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"--"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":"3"},{"name":"DB","value":"11"},{"name":"Class","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Range","value":"1 Target, Melee"},{"name":"Effect","value":"On Even-Numbered Rolls, the target is Slowed for one full round."},{"name":"Limitation","value":"Melee Weapons Only"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.291"}}

Sweeping Strike.embed: {"title":"Sweeping Strike","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"--"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":"3"},{"name":"DB","value":"9"},{"name":"Class","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Range","value":"WR, 1 Target"},{"name":"Effect","value":"You may attempt a Trip Maneuver against the target as a free action."},{"name":"Limitation","value":"Short-Range Weapons or Weapons with the Reach Quality Only"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.291"}}

Razor Wind.embed: {"title":"Razor Wind","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":"2"},{"name":"DB","value":"8"},{"name":"Class","value":"Special"},{"name":"Range","value":"10, 3 Targets, Set -Up"},{"name":"Effect","value":"Set-Up Effect: The user may not shift this round. The user whips up a whirlwind around themselves, granting +2 Evasion until the end of their next turn and destroying any Smokescreen or Hazards on any squares it is standing on and in all squares adjacent to it. Resolution Effect: The user attacks with Razor Wind. Razor Wind is a Critical Hit on 18+."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Cool"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Special Attention"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.404"}}

Stealth Rock.embed: {"title":"Stealth Rock","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Rock"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Class","value":"Status"},{"name":"Range","value":"Field, Hazard"},{"name":"Effect","value":"Set 4 square meters of Stealth Rock hazards within 6 meters. If a foe moves within 2 meters of a space occupied by Rocks, move at most one Rock to the offender, then destroy the Rock. When that happens, the Stealth Rock causes a foe to lose a Tick of Hit Points. Stealth Rock is considered to be dealing damage; Apply Weakness and Resistance. Do not apply stats. A Pok\u00e9mon who has been hit by a Stealth Rock Hazard cannot get hit by another in the same encounter until it is returned to a Pok\u00e9 Ball and then sent back out. *Grants Materializer"},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Cool"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Sabotage"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.427"}}

Lick.embed: {"title":"Lick","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Ghost"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":"2"},{"name":"DB","value":"3"},{"name":"Class","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Effect","value":"Lick Paralyzes the target on 15+."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Tough"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Inversed Appeal"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.378"}}

Hold Hands.embed: {"title":"Hold Hands","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"Class","value":"Status"},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Effect","value":"The target and the user each gain three Ticks of Temporary Hit Points, and a +2 Bonus to Save Checks for 1 full round."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Cute"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Get Ready!"}],"footer":{"text":"Sept.: p.4"}}

Bubble Beam.embed: {"title":"Bubble Beam","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Water"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":"2"},{"name":"DB","value":"8"},{"name":"Class","value":"Special"},{"name":"Range","value":"4, 1 Target"},{"name":"Effect","value":"Bubble Beam lowers the target's Speed by -1 CS on 18+."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Beauty"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Desperation"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.432"}}

Sparkling Aria.embed: {"title":"Sparkling Aria","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":" Water"},{"name":"Frequency","value":" EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":" 2"},{"name":"DB","value":"9"},{"name":"Class","value":" Special"},{"name":"Range","value":" Melee, 2 Targets"},{"name":"Effect","value":" When you hit a target with Sparkling Aria, the user may choose to deal no damage and instead cure that target of Burn, Confusion, Infatuation, or Rage."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":" Beauty"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":" Attention Grabber"}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.24"}}

Steam Eruption.embed: {"title":"Steam Eruption","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":" Water"},{"name":"Frequency","value":" Scene"},{"name":"AC","value":" 3"},{"name":"DB","value":"11"},{"name":"Class","value":" Special"},{"name":"Range","value":" Close Blast 3, Smite"},{"name":"Effect","value":" Steam Eruption burns all legal targets on a 15+."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":" Cool"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":" Seen Nothing Yet"}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.24"}}

Deadly Strike.embed: {"title":"Deadly Strike","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"--"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":"2"},{"name":"DB","value":"6"},{"name":"Class","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Range","value":"WR, 1 Target"},{"name":"Effect","value":"If Deadly Strike Hits, it is a Critical Hit."},{"name":"Limitation","value":"Not usable by Large Melee Weapons."}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.290"}}

Fire Punch.embed: {"title":"Fire Punch","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fire"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":"2"},{"name":"DB","value":"8"},{"name":"Class","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Effect","value":"Fire Punch Burns the target on 19+."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Beauty"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Exhausting Act"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.370"}}

U-Turn.embed: {"title":"U-Turn","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Bug"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":"2"},{"name":"DB","value":"7"},{"name":"Class","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target, Dash"},{"name":"Effect","value":"The user deals damage and then is immediately recalled to its Pok\u00e9 Ball in the same turn. A New Pok\u00e9mon may immediately be sent out. Using U-Turn lets a Trapped user be recalled."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Cute"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Inversed Appeal"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.349"}}

Shadow Force.embed: {"title":"Shadow Force","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Ghost"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x3"},{"name":"AC","value":"2"},{"name":"DB","value":"12"},{"name":"Class","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target, Set-Up"},{"name":"Effect","value":"Set-Up Effect: The user is removed from the field, and their turn ends. Resolution Effect: Shadow Force\u2019s user appears adjacent to any legal target on the field, ignoring Movement Capabilities, and then uses Shadow Force\u2019s attack. Shadow Force cannot be avoided by Moves with the Shield Keyword, the Dodge Ability, or similar effects, and Intercepts may not be attempted in response."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Smart"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Seen Nothing Yet"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.379"}}

Water Spout.embed: {"title":"Water Spout","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Water"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily"},{"name":"AC","value":"4"},{"name":"DB","value":"15"},{"name":"Class","value":"Special"},{"name":"Range","value":"Burst 1*"},{"name":"Effect","value":"For each 10% of HP the user is missing, Water Spout's Damage Base is reduced by -1. Water Spout creates a 1 meter burst, but also affects an area 10 meters tall straight up."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Beauty"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Seen Nothing Yet"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.435"}}

Sing.embed: {"title":"Sing","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"AC","value":"10"},{"name":"Class","value":"Status"},{"name":"Range","value":"Burst 2, Friendly, Sonic"},{"name":"Effect","value":"All legal Targets fall Asleep. On a miss, Sing instead causes targets to become Slowed and suffer a -2 penalty to their Evasion until the end of the user's next turn."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Cute"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Excitement"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.407"}}

High Jump Kick.embed: {"title":"High Jump Kick","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fighting"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":"3"},{"name":"DB","value":"13"},{"name":"Class","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, Dash, 1 Target"},{"name":"Effect","value":"If High Jump Kick misses, the user loses Hit Points equal to 1\/4th of their Max Hit Points. A failure to hit due to a Move with the Shield keyword does not count as a miss. This cannot be used if Gravity is in effect."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Cool"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Steady Performance"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.365"}}

Leech Seed.embed: {"title":"Leech Seed","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Grass"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x2"},{"name":"AC","value":"4"},{"name":"Class","value":"Status"},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target"},{"name":"Effect","value":"At the beginning of each of the target's turns, Leech Seed's target loses 1\/10th of their full HP. Leech Seed's user then gains HP equal to the amount the target lost. Leech Seed lasts until the target faints or is returned to a Pok\u00e9 Ball. Grass Types and targets immune to Grass Attacks are immune to Leech Seed"},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Smart"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Safe Option"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.382"}}

Parting Shot.embed: {"title":"Parting Shot","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Dark"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":"2"},{"name":"Class","value":"Status"},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target, Social"},{"name":"Effect","value":"If Parting Shot successfully hits, the target's Attack and Special Attack stats are lowered by one CS and the user is immediately recalled in the same turn. A new Pok\u00e9mon may immediately be sent out. using Parting Shot lets a Trapped user be recalled."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Smart"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Catching Up"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.352"}}

Encore.embed: {"title":"Encore","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":"2"},{"name":"Class","value":"Status"},{"name":"Range","value":"4, 1 Target, Social"},{"name":"Effect","value":"Roll 1d6. On a result of 1 or 2, the target becomes Confused; on a result of 3 or 4 the target becomes Suppressed; on a result of 5 or 6 the target becomes Enraged."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Cute"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Good Show!"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.395"}}

Acid Armor.embed: {"title":"Acid Armor","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Poison"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Class","value":"Status"},{"name":"Range","value":"Self, Set-Up"},{"name":"Effect","value":"Set-Up Effect: The user becomes Liquefied. While Liquefied, the user is Slowed and cannot take Standard Actions except to Resolve the effect of Acid Armor, the user's Movement is never obstructed by rough or slow terrain, and the user can shift even through the smallest openings. Furthermore, while Liquefied, the user is completely immune to all Physical damage and becomes completely invisible if fully submerged in any liquid. Resolution Effect: The user gains +1 Defense CS, then stops being liquified."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Tough"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Get Ready!"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.414"}}

Mat Block.embed: {"title":"Mat Block","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fighting"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Class","value":"Status"},{"name":"Range","value":"Self, Trigger, Interrupt, Shield"},{"name":"Effect","value":"If the user or an adjacent ally is hit by a damagin attack, the user may use Mat Block. The attack instead does not hit any targets, and it deals no damage and has no effects. You may only use Mat Block during the first round of an encounter"},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Tough"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Reflective Appeal"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.366"}}

Trick.embed: {"title":"Trick","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"AC","value":"2"},{"name":"Class","value":"Status"},{"name":"Range","value":"5, 2 Targets"},{"name":"Effect","value":"Both targets must be hit for Trick to succeed. The user may target itself or willing allies with Trick; you do not need to roll for Accuracy Check in these cases. Both targets lose their Held Item and gain the other target's Held Item. If a target has no Held Item, they still can gain the other target's Held Item."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Smart"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Attention Grabber"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.425"}}

Counter.embed: {"title":"Counter","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fighting"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"DB","value":"See Effect"},{"name":"Class","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target, Reaction, Trigger"},{"name":"Effect","value":"Counter may be used as a Reaction when the user is hit by a damaging Physical Attack. Resolve the Triggering Attack, with Counter's user resisting the attack one step further. After the attack is resolved, if Counter's user was not Fainted, the triggering foe then loses Hit Points equal to twice the amount of Hit Points lost by the user from the triggering attack. Note that Counter is Physical, and while it cannot miss, it cannot hit targets immune to Fighting-Type Moves."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Tough"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Double TIme"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.363"}}

Miracle Eye.embed: {"title":"Miracle Eye","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"Class","value":"Status"},{"name":"Range","value":"Self, Swift Action"},{"name":"Effect","value":"Miracle Eye may be activated as a Swift Action on the user\u2019s turn. For the rest of the turn, the user\u2019s Psychic-Type Moves can hit and affect Dark-Type targets, and the user can see through the Illusion Ability, Moves with the Illusion keyword, and effects created by the Illusionist Capability, ignoring all effects from those."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Cute"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Good Show!"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.422"}}

Poison Tail.embed: {"title":"Poison Tail","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Poison"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"AC","value":"2"},{"name":"DB","value":"5"},{"name":"Class","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Effect","value":"Poison Tail is a Critical Hit on 18+ and Poisons the target on 19+."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Smart"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Incentives"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.415"}}

Powder (Move).embed: {"title":"Powder (Move)","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Bug"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"Class","value":"Status"},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target, Interrupt, Powder"},{"name":"Effect","value":"The target is dusted with a Coat of flammable powder. If the affected target uses a damaging Fire-Type attack, the attack is negated and instead creates a Blast 3 centered on itself as the powder explodes, and the Coat is removed. All legal targets within the Blast take damage equal to what the user of the Fire-Type attack would roll for the damage of their attack. This damage is Typeless or Fire-Type, whichever would be more effective."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Beauty"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Sabotage"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.347"}}

Grassy Terrain.embed: {"title":"Grassy Terrain","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Grass"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x2"},{"name":"Class","value":"Status"},{"name":"Range","value":"Field"},{"name":"Effect","value":"The area becomes Grassy for 5 rounds. While Grassy, all Pok\u00e9mon and Trainers standing on the ground recover 1\/10th of their maximum Hit Points at the start of every turn, and Grass-Type attacks performed by grounded Pok\u00e9mon and Trainers gain a +10 bonus to Damage Rolls."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Beauty"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Get Ready"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.381"}}

Sonic Boom.embed: {"title":"Sonic Boom","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":"6"},{"name":"DB","value":"15 Damage"},{"name":"Class","value":"Special"},{"name":"Range","value":"8, 1 Target"},{"name":"Effect","value":"Sonicboom causes the target to lose 15 HP. Sonicboom is Special and interacts with other moves and effects as such (Special Evasion may be applied to avoid it, Mirror Coat can reflect it, etc.)"},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Cool"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Steady Performance"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.409"}}

Dive (Move).embed: {"title":"Dive (Move)","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Water"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":"2"},{"name":"DB","value":"8"},{"name":"Class","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Range","value":"Burst 1, Set Up, Full Action"},{"name":"Effect","value":"Set-Up Effect: The user moves underwater and its turn ends. The user must be in water at least 10 meters deep to use Dive. While underwater, the user may not be targeted by Moves. Resolution Effect: The user may shift horizontally using their underwater speed, and then may shift straight up until reaching a target. The user then attacks with Dive, creating a Burst 1."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Beauty"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Special Attention"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.433"}}

Crush Grip.embed: {"title":"Crush Grip","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"AC","value":"2"},{"name":"DB","value":"12"},{"name":"Class","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Effect","value":"For every 10% the target is below their full Hit Points, Crush Grip's Damage Base is reduced by 1."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Tough"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Double TIme"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.394"}}

Payback.embed: {"title":"Payback","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Dark"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":"2"},{"name":"DB","value":"5"},{"name":"Class","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Effect","value":"If the target hit the user with a Damaging Move on the previous turn, Payback has a Damage Base of 10 (3d8+10 \/ 24) instead."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Cool"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Special Attention"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.352"}}

Beat Up.embed: {"title":"Beat Up","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Dark"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"DB","value":"See Effect"},{"name":"Class","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Effect","value":"The user and up to two allies adjacent to the target may each make a Struggle Attack against the target. These Struggle Attacks hit for Dark-Type Damage instead of their usual Type. Beat Up may trigger Pack Hunt only once, no matter the number of attacks."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Smart"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Reliable"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.350"}}

Barrier.embed: {"title":"Barrier","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"Class","value":"Status"},{"name":"Range","value":"Hazard"},{"name":"Effect","value":"The user creates a Barrier of psychic energy. The user places up to 4 segments of Barrier; each segment must be continuous with another segment, and at least one must be adjacent to the user. These barriers count as blocking terrain and last until the end of the encounter or until they are destroyed. Each Barrier segment is 2 meters tall, 1 meter wide, and 2 centimeters thick. Each segment has 20 Hit Points, 15 Damage Reduction, and takes damage as if it was Psychic Typed."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Cool"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Sabotage"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.418"}}

Perish Song.embed: {"title":"Perish Song","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily"},{"name":"Class","value":"Status"},{"name":"Range","value":"Burst 15, Sonic"},{"name":"Effect","value":"Perish Song cannot miss. All targets, including the user, receive a Perish Count of 3. At the beginning of each of the target\u2019s turns, their Perish count is lowered by 1. Once a Perish Count reaches 0, set the Pok\u00e9mon\u2019s Hit Points to 0. A Perish Count disappears if a target returns to their Pok\u00e9 Ball, Takes a Breather, or is knocked out. Perish Song never causes Massive Damage."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Beauty"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Unsettling"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.403"}}

Aromatherapy.embed: {"title":"Aromatherapy","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Grass"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Class","value":"Status"},{"name":"Range","value":"Burst 1, Healing"},{"name":"Effect","value":"All allies in the burst are cured of one status condition of their choice."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Smart"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Reflective Appeal"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.380"}}

Heal Pulse.embed: {"title":"Heal Pulse","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily x2"},{"name":"Class","value":"Status"},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target, Aura, Healing"},{"name":"Effect","value":"Restores 50% of the target\u2019s max Hit Points. Heal Pulse\u2019s user may not target itself with Heal Pulse."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Beauty"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Reflective Appeal"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.420"}}

Healing Wish.embed: {"title":"Healing Wish","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Psychic"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Daily"},{"name":"Class","value":"Status"},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target, Healing"},{"name":"Effect","value":"The user immediately Faints, lowering its HP to 0. The user takes no Injuries from HP Markers when using Healing Wish. The target is immediately cured of up to 3 injuries, healed to their Maximum Hit Points, and has the Frequency of all Moves restored. Healing Wish may target a Pok\u00e9mon in a Pok\u00e9 Ball. Healing Wish does not restore the Frequency of Healing Wish or Lunar Dance. Injuries healed through Healing Wish count toward the total number of Injuries that can be healed each day, and this healing is limited by the same."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Cute"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Safe Option"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.420"}}

Dark Void.embed: {"title":"Dark Void","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":" Dark"},{"name":"Frequency","value":" EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":" 10"},{"name":"Class","value":" Status"},{"name":"Range","value":" Melee 1"},{"name":"Effect","value":" The target falls Asleep. Once per Scene, Dark Void may be used as if its range were \u201cBurst 5, Friendly\u201d instead."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":" Smart"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":" Excitement"}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.8"}}

Flying Press.embed: {"title":"Flying Press","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":" Fighting"},{"name":"Frequency","value":" EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":" 3"},{"name":"DB","value":"10"},{"name":"Class","value":" Physical"},{"name":"Range","value":" Melee, 1 Target, Dash"},{"name":"Effect","value":" Flying Press may deal Flying Type damage if the user wishes."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":" Tough"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":" Big Show"},{"name":"Note","value":" If Flying Press is Move Sync\u2019d, it only changes the Fighting Type portion of the Move. You can still only choose between that Type and Flying Type; you cannot shift Flying Press to change the Flying part to another Type."}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.12"}}

Mind Reader.embed: {"title":"Mind Reader","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"Class","value":"Status"},{"name":"Range","value":"6, 1 Target"},{"name":"Effect","value":"The target becomes Read to the user until the end of the user\u2019s next turn. The user may end this effect when making an Attack on the user, causing that attack to automatically hit; OR when the Read target uses an Attack against the user, causing that attack to automatically miss. If the user has the Telepathy Capability, the user automatically succeeds on a mindreading attempt against the target, and may listen to the target\u2019s surface thoughts as long as they remain Read. Mind Reader automatically misses against targets with the Mindlock Capability."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Smart"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Good Show!"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.402"}}

Vital Throw.embed: {"title":"Vital Throw","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Fighting"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"DB","value":"7"},{"name":"Class","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target, Push, Reaction"},{"name":"Effect","value":"If the user is targeted by a Melee attack and has not yet taken a turn this round, the user may declare Vital Throw. After the triggering attack is resolved, the user may use Vital Throw against the triggering foe as a Reaction. Vital Throw cannot miss."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Cool"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Desperation"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.368"}}

Defense Curl.embed: {"title":"Defense Curl","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"At-Will"},{"name":"Class","value":"Status"},{"name":"Range","value":"Self"},{"name":"Effect","value":"The user\u2019s Defense is raised 1 Combat Stage and they become Curled Up until the end of the Scene or they are Recalled or Take a Breather. When using the Moves Rollout or Ice Ball while Curled Up, the user gains a +10 bonus to the damage rolls of those Moves."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Cute"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Sabotage"}],"footer":{"text":"Sept.: p.4"}}

Thousand Arrows.embed: {"title":"Thousand Arrows","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":" Ground"},{"name":"Frequency","value":" Scene"},{"name":"AC","value":" 2"},{"name":"DB","value":"9"},{"name":"Class","value":" Physical"},{"name":"Range","value":" 6, 1 Target"},{"name":"Effect","value":" When calculating Weakness and Resistance for Thousand Arrows, Flying-Typed targets calculate damage as if Flying was neutral to Ground. Thousand Arrows ignores the Levitate ability. The target is knocked down to ground level, and loses all Sky or Levitate Speeds for 3 turns. During this time, they may be hit by Ground-Type Moves even if normally immune."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":" Tough"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":" Steady Performance"}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.17"}}

Bide.embed: {"title":"Bide","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene"},{"name":"DB","value":"See Effect"},{"name":"Class","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Range","value":"Burst 1, Friendly"},{"name":"Effect","value":"The user may use Bide as a Reaction Move upon being Hit by a Damaging Move. During their next available turn, the user may Shift and then use Bide, causing all Adjacent foes to lose X HP, where X is the amount of Damage taken since declaring use of Bide (Loss of life through effects such as Poison is not \u2018Damage\u2019)."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Tough"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Double TIme"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.392"}}

Power Trip.embed: {"title":"Power Trip","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":" Dark"},{"name":"Frequency","value":" EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":" 2"},{"name":"DB","value":"2"},{"name":"Class","value":" Physical"},{"name":"Range","value":" Melee, 1 Target"},{"name":"Effect","value":" This Move gains +2 to its Damage Base for every positive Combat Stage held by the user, to a maximum of DB 20."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":" Tough"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":" Incentives"}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.8"}}

Solar Blade.embed: {"title":"Solar Blade","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":" Grass"},{"name":"Frequency","value":" Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":" 2"},{"name":"DB","value":"13"},{"name":"Class","value":" Physical"},{"name":"Range","value":" Melee, 1 Target, Set Up"},{"name":"Set-Up Effect","value":" If the weather is not Sunny, the user gains +1 Combat Stage in Attack and Special Defense, and the user\u2019s turn ends. If the weather is Sunny, immediately proceed to the Resolution Effect instead and this Move loses the Set-Up keyword."},{"name":"Effect","value":" The user attacks with Solar Blade. If the weather is Rainy, Sandstorming, or Hailing, Solar Blade\u2019s Damage Base is lowered to 6 (2d6+8 \/ 15)."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":" Cool"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":" Special Attention"}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.16"}}

For every status removed, the user recovers a Tick of Hit Points."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":" Smart"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":" Reflective Appeal"}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.20"}}

Sunsteel Strike.embed: {"title":"Sunsteel Strike","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":" Steel"},{"name":"Frequency","value":" Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":" 2"},{"name":"DB","value":"10"},{"name":"Class","value":" Physical"},{"name":"Range","value":" Close Blast 2"},{"name":"Effect","value":" This Move ignores any Abilities that would cause it to fail or miss, such as Dodge or Wonder Guard; those Abilities cannot be activated in response to Sunsteel Strike."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":" Cool"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":" Big Show"}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.23"}}

Swagger Confuses the target."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":" Cute"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":" Excitement"}],"footer":{"text":"USuMo: p.19"}}

Hidden Power (Move).embed: {"title":"Hidden Power","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"DB","value":6},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":2},{"name":"Range","value":"Burst 1"},{"name":"Category","value":"Special"},{"name":"Contest Stats","value":"Smart -  Catching Up"}],"description":"When a Pok\u00e9mon first obtains the Move Hidden Power, roll 1d20. Hidden Power\u2019s Elemental Type will be changed from Normal to Bug on a result of 1; Dark on 2; Dragon on 3; Electric on 4; Fairy on 5; Fighting on 6; Fire on 7; Flying on 8; Ghost on 9; Grass on 10; Ground on 11; Ice on 12; Normal on 13; Poison on 14; Psychic on 15; Rock on 16; Steel on 17; Water on 18; and on 19 or 20, reroll until you roll another number. This effect is permanent \u2013 if Hidden Power is forgotten and relearned, the chosen Type remains the same.","footer":{"text":"Core: p.399"}}

Camouflage.embed: {"title":"Camouflage","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"Class","value":"Status"},{"name":"Range","value":"Self"},{"name":"Effect","value":"The user changes their Type to match the field. Forests and grassy areas change the user into a Grass Type. Watery areas change the user into a Water Type. Caves and Mountains could change the user into a Rock or Ground Type. An icy terrain would turn the user into an Ice Type. A building may change the user into a Steel or Normal Type. Weather affects what Type the user becomes. Use common sense; if you are having difficult determining what Type the user should become, consult the GM. *Grants Blender"},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Smart"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Sabotage"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.392"}}

Sky Drop.embed: {"title":"Sky Drop","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Flying"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"Scene x2"},{"name":"AC","value":"3"},{"name":"DB","value":"6"},{"name":"Class","value":"Physical"},{"name":"Range","value":"Melee, 1 Target, Set-Up"},{"name":"Effect","value":"Set-Up Effect: Make Sky Drop's Accuracy Check. If the user hits, the user and target are moved 25 meters into the air. The target forfeits their next turn and cannot Shift or take actions until Sky Drop is resolved. Resolution Effect: Shift while in the air and lower both the user and the target heights back to the ground. Then apply Sky Drop's damage. If the target has a Sky or Levitate Speed, Sky Drop fails to deal damage. If the user is Fainted after the Set-Up but before the Resolution, the target falls to the ground and takes damage as if Sky Drop had a Damage Base of 3 (1d6+5\/8) unless they have a Sky or Levitate Speed, in which case they take no damage."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Smart"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Special Attention"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.375"}}

Weather Ball.embed: {"title":"Weather Ball","fields":[{"name":"Type","value":"Normal"},{"name":"Frequency","value":"EOT"},{"name":"AC","value":"2"},{"name":"DB","value":"5"},{"name":"Class","value":"Special"},{"name":"Range","value":"8, 1 Target"},{"name":"Effect","value":"If it is Sunny, Weather Ball is Fire-Type. If it is Rainy, Weather Ball is Water-Type. If it is Hailing, Weather Ball is Ice-Type. If it is Sandstorming, Weather Ball is Rock-Type. When a weather effect is on the field, Weather Ball has a Damage Base of 10 (3d8+10 \/ 24). If there are multiple Weather Effects on the field, choose one type for Weather Ball to be that corresponds with an existing Weather Effect."},{"name":"Contest Type","value":"Smart"},{"name":"Contest Effect","value":"Incentives"}],"footer":{"text":"Core: p.413"}}
